name: II. “EXCITARE AD REM”. Adulescentia (proelium).
description:
2/4 from the “Renaissance” genesis collection.
It’s a collection that emerges from past eras to reconnect us with our nature as human beings and remind us four of the stages of our development.

Description of the piece:
This second painting represents the awakening of innocence. The breaking of that illusion. When this wall falls, you can have a more realistic view of life. The being goes through a moment of mourning, the death of illusion. At this stage the person rebels against the established and raises a battle against everything and everyone, they perceive that the world is against them. 
The author depicts this stage with an epic battle in which several knights fight for a banner.

2000x2047px

Full story here: nft.matiasmarano.com/renaissance
